lambs.name: Petrol Lantern
lambs.description: This is a simple, fuel-based lantern that can serve a child to study for up to two nights.

lambs.name: Gas Lantern
lambs.description: This gas lantern offers a brighter display than the petrol lantern and can help a child study for up to 4 nights and is easily portable.

lambs.name: Solar Lantern
lambs.description: By far, the best lamp in our program and affordable to the user for the long-term. The solar lantern combines the ease of charging through solar energy and is convinient for the most-remote of areas that our 'little champions' may come from. Also, it shined the brightest at night.
